name: Mouse (kypello)
description:
This is a puzzle game about guiding a mouse through each level to reach the goal.

-Click the play button in the top right to make the mouse move

-On the right side of the screen is the runes you can use in each level. Click on a rune and then click again to place it somewhere.

I haven't made a puzzle game before so please tell me if it's too easy, too hard or in the middle.

Made for Weekly Game Jam 70, the theme being "Ancient Technology"

MUSIC WILL BE ADDED SOON
